args: Does this describe a specific, new, official action or formal announcement already taken/made by the Trump administration? Answer only "yes" or "no". DOGE staffer Marko Elez resigns after report on racist social media posts A 25-year-old staffer who was granted access to the Treasury Department’s sensitive payments system has resigned after the Wall Street Journal surfaced his racist and pro-eugenics posts, a person familiar with the matter said. Marko Elez, who was working at Treasury but was affiliated with billionaire Elon Musk’s U.S. DOGE Service, resigned after the Journal unearthed his posts. “Just for the record, I was racist before it was cool,” his account posted, the Journal reported. Elez was one of two people affiliated with DOGE that a federal court allowed to access the Treasury system, which is responsible for disbursing more than $5 trillion in annual payments. The person familiar with the matter spoke on the condition of anonymity to describe internal government matters. Elez worked for Musk at SpaceX, Starlink and X, according to the Journal.
